author: morice-net
message:
Nice to see this anouncement!
Have a great time there!

Btw, don't you think it would have a better audience in french ? and posted on planet-fr ?

replies.author: Aurélien Gâteau
replies.message: Could have been, but it is already difficult to find time to keep my blog alive, I can't afford blogging in French as well :/
